joint_state.description: Property. This message contains information about the robot state, i.e. the positions of its joints and links

multi_dof_joint_state.description: Property. Joints that may have multiple DOF are specified here

attached_collision_objects.description: Property. Attached collision objects (attached to some link on the robot)

is_diff.description: Property. Flag indicating whether this scene is to be interpreted as a diff with respect to some other scene This is mostly important for handling the attached bodies (whether or not to clear the attached bodies of a moveit::core::RobotState before updating it with this message)
